author: Tim Paradis
title: Your résumé is probably getting too long. Here's how to fix it.
description: Some job seekers are adding more details to their résumés to stand out, but experts warn that overly long CVs can hurt people's prospects.
content:
When a résumé gets too long, it can make it harder for a job seeker to stand out.Joe Raedle/Getty Images
